mapper.select: select count(*) from board where sportCode = #{sportCode}

select * from( select rownum as rrownum, d.* from( select rownum as rnum , c.* from (select a.* from board a where a.sportCode = #{sportCode} order by boardNumber) c order by rnum desc)d ) where rrownum>= #{startRow} and rrownum<= #{endRow}
select tm.memberbirth , tm.memberregion from teammember tm , team t where t.sportType=#{sportType} and tm.teamcode = t.teamCode
select gameDate from gameRecord where sportType=#{sportType}

select * from ( select rownum as rnum, d.* from (select t.emblem,t.teamname,t.teamleaderName,h.ground from homeground h, team t where t.sportType=#{sportType} and t.teamcode=h.teamCode order by t.teamCode desc) d ) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
select * from leagueInfo where leagueSport=#{sportType} and leagueState = 1
select leagueCode , count(leagueCode) cnt from leagueJoin group by leagueCode
select count(*) from leagueJoin where leagueCode = #{leagueCode} and TeamCode = (select teamCode from team where teamName=#{teamName})
select count(*) from team where sportType=#{sportType}

select * from( select rownum as rrownum, d.* from( select rownum as rnum , c.* from (select * from gameRecord where sportType = #{gameType} and gameState='경기 전' order by gameDate desc) c order by rnum desc)d ) where rrownum>= 1 and rrownum<= 5
select teamName from team where teamCode = #{teamCode}
select emblem from team where teamCode=#{teamCode}

select * from (select rownum as rrownum, d.* from ((select rownum as rnum, c.* from (select team.*,homeground.ground from team,teammember,homeground where team.teamcode=teammember.teamcode and team.teamcode=homeground.teamcode and teammember.MEMBERREGION like '%'||#{regionSido}||'%') c order by rnum desc) d) )e where rrownum>=#{startRow} and rrownum <=#{endRow}
select distinct sido from zipcode where not sido=#{regionSido}
